summary: Replaces several weapons with realistic counterparts. 30 weapons currently.
descriptionHtml:
Originally I made this for my personal use. But I figured hey, there is probably other people out there that would appreciate realistic weapons in their game. Me personally I can\'t stand vanilla skyrims over sized go go power ranger weapons. So what exactly does this mod change/replace? 
This 

Blades sword 
Elven sword/greatsword 
Forsworn axe/sword
Iron mace/sword, greatsword 
Scimitar 
Silver sword/greatsword 
Steel sword/mace, greatsword, dagger 
Longbow - I edited the mesh to make it more realistic, longer and thinner( that\'s what she said)
It would also change steel, iron,elven arrows, but I haven\'t gotten permission yet. They would include longer arrow\'s   

If your using 1.1, you will want to update to 1.2. 1.1\'s battleaxes are messed up, and will cause bugs.

Update  1.1  

Changes 

Dwarven battleaxe 
Dwarven dagger 
Dwarven greatsword 
Dwarven handaxe 
Dwarven mace 
Dwarven sword 
Elven battleaxe
Elven waraxe 
Iron battleaxe 
Steel battleaxe 
optional steel dagger 

Update 1.2  
Changes

Fixed the battle axes thanks to moraelin 
added iron waraxe and steel waraxe also thanks to moraelin
added ebony greatsword
Optional file for alternate iron battleaxe

Update 8/18/2012 
Fixed the blood issues with dwarven/elven weapons. Sadly it also converts them back their normal size. I\'m aware of the other blood issues, like on the iron sword just haven\'t gotten around to it.

I didn\'t change any of the more fantasy based weapons. Such as deadric, ebony, orc, dwarven(replaced). Mainly because I don\'t use them anyway, and I don\'t see too many bandits using these weapons. If anyone would like to request to have these changed as well, go for it. Just keep it in mind I will not use any weapons that aren\'t realistic, so no 10 foot anime swords.  

Side note 
If there are any weapon replacements you don\'t care for, you can just choose to not install them.

Compatibility 
It will work with any mod, that doesn\'t replace the weapons above. 

Bugs 

None that I\'m aware of. (1.1 has a bug with the battleaxes, don\'t use it. I deleted the download.)


Requirements 
None everything is included, should be atleast. Let me know if there are any textures missing.


Permission  

This is just a replacer, for permission you would have to go directly to the mod authors. 

Recommended mods( realism)  ASIS  damage multiplier http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17987   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5485  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20217  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5289   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/60  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16916


Credits  
CentificGrafics  blade of eplear  
InsanitySorrow celtic katana 
Arriere   Paw real weapons 
Moraelin  arming swords, morealin\'s mace\'s. secretofthesilverblades, european greatsword, halberds & battleaxes 
Andragorn -  andragorns armoury
author: Germ1
